traits.locale_text: "Зачем вам столько оружия? Уж не бунт ли вы задумали?"

languages.text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"

traits.locale_text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"
"Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"
"Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"
"Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"
"Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"

languages.text: «¿Para qué quieren mis armas? ¿Acaso piensan amotinarse?».
languages.original_text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Para qué quieren mis armas? ¿Acaso piensan amotinarse?».

languages.text: 「なぜ私の武器を欲しがる？反乱を起こすつもりか？」
languages.original_text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ私の武器を欲しがる？反乱を起こすつもりか？」

languages.text: “你们拿我的武器干什么？是要造反吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"

traits.locale_text: “你们拿我的武器干什么？是要造反吗？”

languages.text: "Warum wollt ihr meine Waffen? Wollt ihr rebellieren?"
languages.original_text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum wollt ihr meine Waffen? Wollt ihr rebellieren?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi en avez-vous après mes armes ? Vous préparez une mutinerie ? »
languages.original_text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi en avez-vous après mes armes ? Vous préparez une mutinerie ? »

languages.original_text: "Why do you want my weapons? Are you going to rebel?"
